\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 99570}

\subsection*{Jhana}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Troy}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 190.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I started meditating regularly like 1 year ago. I reached a level of very extreme concentration that gives me a very intense high upon exhale of breath.



This sensation is comparable to a very intense calm. After I started going into these states while breathing I started getting these natural sensations comparable to a morphine rush. 



I have been told I am having a kundalini awakening, the buddhist articles I read said I had entered the jhana. 



To reach these states I would suggest concentration meditation daily or whenever you can. It may take months or even years to attain this state.

\end{document}
